What is Get Mastered?

Get Mastered is a resource for musicians to hone their recording and mixing skills, and home of the absolute best value mastering services -- Learn more

Who Am I?

My name is Keenan and I've been mastering, mixing, and recording music for six years. I currently aspire to gain a masters in acoustics

Done mixing?

Get Mastered, right now


Looking for something?

sound | analog-vs-digital | microphones | automation | compression | EQ | reverb | depth

Want 10% off your first job?

Get Mastered By Me

Do your mixes need that "extra something"?

Do you want your mixes loud enough to compete with commercial standards?

Do you want the absolute best price for a professional mastering job, with a human (not an algorithm!) at the reins?

You've come to the right place.

Since I'm based online, I don't have the overhead associated with typical mastering studios, which means I can give you professional quality masters at extremely competitive rates that you really won't find anywhere else (I did the research, and you can too)

If that's not enough: for every five songs I master for you, I'll master a sixth for free.

Interested? Email me at services@getmastered.com and let me know what I can help you with. My rates are:



I can even help you get your songs on popular music services, such as Spotify, Apple Music, and Google Play. Drop me a line at services@getmastered.com to Get Mastered!

Hope to hear you soon,
Keenan
